description.narrative: Cultural integration in disadvantaged areas is an obstacle for the social integration of young people into working life, but we cancope with this phenomenon of stagnation and cultural inaction by encouraging these young people to engage in different fields. Promote access to culture for all Promote access to leisure Awareness of basic rights. On February 15, 2011, the Tunisian Association ofCultural Action (A.T.A .C.) Was declared to Regueb by a group of volunteers who formed the project in order to compensate for the inertia of the youth. The Regueb culture house provides them with a room to carry out their activities. The A.T.A.C association triesto make a diagnosis of Regueb's society from which will emerge the needs related to pretension, cultureand leisure. The strategy isbased on three essential axes: Within 3 years, and with the support of local communities, the association will become a job creator. The CC.ATAC “Cultural Corner” project will redefine its objectives and their implementation.Itwill be aimed at young people from the Regueb neighborhoods, their families and life in these neighborhoods. Innovative in terms of reflection, the association will focus more particularly on the organization and creation of activities dedicated to culture and leisure. Raise awareness among citizens The creation of a CF.ATAC "training center" within the association. This training center will offer citizens: Family Info Point (P.I.F.) Support for schooling Youth library and animation Arts <(>&<)> Culture Workshops Animation for adults-parents-families Internet <(>&<)> multimedia area. Boost social life This activity includes the organization of seminars, events, stays and the creation of cultural and artistic events. Sponsorship of civil associations inTunisia. After 5 years, the association (A.T.A.C) will establish culture for all, it will become a recognized interlocutor in the socio-cultural field and open to all of Tunisia by offering culturalevents and artistic activities.
